tool_description: with this api ypu are able to get a random username profiles with all the details including name , job , avatar ....
title: profile details api

api_list.name: user
api_list.description: it used to fetch users randomly
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://profile-details-api.p.rapidapi.com/user"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "profile-details-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
